@graph.description: This repository reproduces experimental results from the VLDB 2021 paper Beyond Equi-joins: Ranking, Enumeration and Factorization. The work focuses on query processing techniques beyond traditional equi-joins, including ranked enumeration, factorized representations, and efficient enumeration of query results. All algorithms and theoretical ideas originate from the original authors. This artifact is provided solely for reproducibility. Original repository: https://github.com/northeastern-datalab/anyk-code/
@graph.disambiguatingDescription: Reproducibility of VLDB 2021 Beyond Equi-joins experiments
@graph.name: Beyond Equi-joins: Ranking, Enumeration and Factorization (Reproducibility)
